english.segment1: It's so easy to find the faults. In everyone else & not look at myself. I'm geting used to not having to. Look at the facts of where I'm at
english.segment2: You don't know me so don't judge me. Your biased bigotry can't control me
english.segment3: God's son my judge only He & not you who ar you. You see my skin God see's my heart deep within
english.segment4: The way I see the way it seems to me. I won't agree you can't live my life for me
